response.overview: The death of his wife, a son with mysterious powers in his hands, a red torii gate... The film is a cleverly made occult film, which leads to the theme ‘What is a Japanese person? Selected for the PFF Award 2002.  Late 1945. Sugita, who has lost his wife and lives with his son Kunio, has a problem. After his wife's death, Kunio begins to undergo changes that are unthinkable. He takes him to see a doctor, but he can't find anything wrong with him. After the doctor leaves, Sugita sees a series of sights he never expected to see.
response.title: The Golden Moon
